name: Pebble
description: Pebble has developed a smartwatch with technology that enables two-way communication between the device and a smartphone. Users can also download watchapps for Pebble including creative watchfaces and activity trackers.

funding.investors: Paul Buchheit, Draper Associates, ACE & Company, Mark Friedgan, Tim Draper, Y Combinator
